page.title: 17SOCIAL SURVEY-LEISURE 2
page.content: FROM OUR SURVEY WE DISCOVERED INTERESTING FACTS ON HOW PEOPLE SPEND THEIR LEISURE TIME. FOR EXAMPLE FEW PEOPLE GO OFTEN TO THE CINEMA. THERE APPEARED TO BE TWO REASONS FOR THIS. FIRSTLY THE NEAREST CINEMA IS 12 MILES AWAY. THE SECOND REASON IS THE RISING COST OF GOING THERE."IT'S TOO DEAR" AND "IT'S TOO FAR AND TOO EXPENSIVE TO TRAVEL" WERE COMMON STATEMENTS. IT WOULD APPEAR THAT IN AN AREA OF HIGH UNEMPLOYMENT COST IS A BIG PROBLEM. FOR SIMILAR REASONS FEW PEOPLE ATTEND THE THEATRE. THE MOST POPULAR ENTERTAINMENT WAS WATCHING TELEVISION THOUGH NOT MANY WATCHED VIDEO FILMS. GOING TO THE "PUB" WAS OBVIUOSLY A POPULAR PASTIME. MANY MADE COMMENTS LIKE "I CAN MEET MY FRIENDS" AND "IT GIVES ME SOMEWHERE TO GO AWAY FROM THE HOUSE" BINGO WAS ALSO VERY POPULAR.
